channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15559] BaseMasterAndRegionObserver doesn't implement all the methods
item.description: It's supposed to be a class that allows someone to derive from that class and only need to implement the desired methods. However two methods aren't implemented.
item.summary: BaseMasterAndRegionObserver doesn't implement all the methods

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: should we remove the abstract? at least we will catch missing methods at compile time?
+1 on removing the abstract. I would say to do the same for BaseRegionObserver as well.

-1 overall
